member.name: IShellFolderBand.GetBandInfoSFB
member.summary: Gets information concerning an object and places it in a structure.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error code otherwise.

member.name: IShellFolderBand.InitializeSFB
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellFolderBand.SetBandInfoSFB
member.summary: Uses the information in a structure to set the band information for a object.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error code otherwise.
